thread.title: Sturgis Brown football team falls to Pierre
thread.title_full: Sturgis Brown football team falls to Pierre

author: Tim Potts Black Hills Pioneer
title: Sturgis Brown football team falls to Pierre
text:
PIERRE — The Sturgis Brown Scoopers couldn’t find their rhythm Friday night, falling to the Pierre Governors, 44-0, at Hollister Field.
The Governors quickly set the tone with a six-play scoring drive. Pierre quarterback Kaleb Lounsbury connected with Carter Schieffelbein on a 31-yard touchdown pass, and with the extra point, the Governors took an early 7-0 lead just minutes into the game.
